Opportunities in the metaverse

The metaverse is a driving force bringing together elements of a new digital age, presenting exciting opportunities for consumers and brands. With an estimated market opportunity of over $1 trillion in yearly revenues, companies are entering the metaverse in different ways, including household names like Walmart and Nike. Business leaders are now asking themselves what their metaverse strategy should be.
